languages.text:
"Пар из разверстой кровавой глотки валил,
Глаз же светился коварством и яростной злобой,
Вихри метели на плечи ложились плащом,
Ждали, когда зверь напоит их теплою кровью.
Даже луна покровителем стала ему,
Облик скрывая его теней лживых пляской,
В вое его отзывался старинный напев
Саг фенрисийских о буйстве бездумном
И сече до смерти".

"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting
for the beast to feed them
with hot blood.
Even the moon stood patron to him,
his face hiding
with the shadows of her deceitful dance.
His howl the old tune echoing
of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."
languages.original_text:
"Пар из разверстой кровавой глотки валил,
Глаз же светился коварством и яростной злобой,
Вихри метели на плечи ложились плащом,
Ждали, когда зверь напоит их теплою кровью.
Даже луна покровителем стала ему,
Облик скрывая его теней лживых пляской,
В вое его отзывался старинный напев
Саг фенрисийских о буйстве бездумном
И сече до смерти".

with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting
for the beast to feed them
with hot blood.
Even the moon stood patron to him,
his face hiding
with the shadows of her deceitful dance.
His howl the old tune echoing
of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."

"The vapor from his bloody throat wafted,
His eyes glowed with guile and fierce malice,
The whirlwinds of the snowstorms laid their cloak on his shoulders,
Waiting for the beast to drink their warm blood.
Even the moon became his patron,
Hiding his face with the shadows of his deceitful dance,
His howl echoed the old tune
Of the Fenrisian sagas of mindless rage
And the fight to the death."

"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting
for the beast to feed them
with hot blood.
Even the moon stood patron to him,
his face hiding
with the shadows of her deceitful dance.
His howl the old tune echoing
of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."

languages.text:
「彼の血なまぐさい息は蒸気に変わり
狡猾と激しい悪意で
彼の目は輝いている
渦巻きは
雪の外套のように
彼の肩の上に降り積もり
獣が熱い血を
分け与えるのを
待っている。
月さえも彼を見守り
彼の顔は
彼女の欺瞞に満ちた踊りの影に隠れていた。
彼の遠吠えは響かせた
無文別な暴挙と
恐ろしい殺戮が潜む
フェンリスのサーガを」
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting
for the beast to feed them
with hot blood.
Even the moon stood patron to him,
his face hiding
with the shadows of her deceitful dance.
His howl the old tune echoing
of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."

無文別な暴挙と
恐ろしい殺戮が潜む
フェンリスのサーガを」

languages.text:
“血腥的吐息化为蒸汽，
他双眼放光，
暗藏狡诈与汹涌的恶意。
打着旋儿的风雪，
如斗篷般披覆在身，
等待着，
以野兽温热的鲜血，
来濯洗。
就连月亮也眷顾英勇的战士，
摇曳的微光将他的面容，
笼罩在跃动的阴影中。
他的战嗥是芬里斯史诗中，
古老的歌谣，
那是忘我的杀戮，
流血千里，尸横遍野。”
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting

of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."

languages.text:
« Son souffle sanglant
en vapeur se transformait.
Ses yeux brillaient de ruse
et d'une malice féroce,
tandis que sur ses épaules
se déposait un manteau de neige
que le sang versé par la bête
viendrait bientôt réchauffer.
Même la lune œuvrait à son profit,
cachant son visage
dans les ombres de sa danse trompeuse.
Son hurlement s'élève,
empreint des sagas fenrissiennes
de violence aveugle
et de carnage sanglants. »
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting

languages.text:
«Su aliento, cruento vapor,
sus ojos relucientes,
pura astucia y maldad,
remolinos blancos,
como una capa de nieve,
sus hombros sobrevuelan,
a la espera
de que la bestia los alimente
con sangre caliente.
Incluso la luna le mostró respeto,
ocultando su rostro
entre las sombras de su baile engañoso.
En su capucha retumbaba el eco
de las antiguas sagas fenrisianas,
de los desenfrenos del saqueo
y de las brutales matanzas».
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,

languages.text:
"Sein blutiger Atem wurde zu Dampf,
Tücke und wilde Bosheit
leuchteten in seinen Augen,
die wirbelnden Flocken
wie ein Schneemantel
liegen auf seinen Schultern,
warten,
dass das Untier sie füttert
mit heißem Blut.
Selbst der Mond stand ihm bei,
sein Gesicht verborgen
von den Schatten ihres listenreichen Tanzes.
Sein Heulen das alte Lied
von den fenrisischen Sagen
von gedankenloser Raserei
und blutigem Gemetzel."
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,

languages.text:
"Kanlı nefesi buhara dönüşüyor,
Kurnaz ve vahşi bir kötülükle
Gözleri parlıyordu.
Dönüp duran girdaplar,
Kardan bir pelerin gibi
Omuzlarında uzanıp
Canavarın onu sıcacık
Kanla beslemesini
Bekliyordu.
Ay bile ondan yanaydı,
Yanıltıcı dansının gölgeleriyle
Onu koruyup yüzünü gizliyordu.
Uluması;
Fenris destanlarının,
Akılsız saldırıların,
Fâni kıyımların eski tınısını taşıyordu."
languages.original_text:
"His gory breath to vapour turning,
with guile and fierce malice
his eyes glowing,
the whirling eddies
like a snow-cloak
upon his shoulders lying,
waiting
for the beast to feed them
with hot blood.
Even the moon stood patron to him,
his face hiding
with the shadows of her deceitful dance.
His howl the old tune echoing
of the Fenrisian sagas
of mindless rampaging
and mortal carnage."

traits.locale_text:
"Kanlı nefesi buhara dönüşüyor,
kurnaz ve vahşi bir kötülükle
gözleri parlıyordu.
Dönüp duran girdaplar,
kardan bir pelerin gibi
omuzlarında uzanıyordu,
bekliyordu
canavarın onu sıcacık kanla
beslemesini.
Ay bile onu koruyordu,
yüzünü gizliyordu
yanıltıcı dansının gölgeleriyle.
Uluması;
Fenris destanlarının,
akılsız saldırıların
ve fâni kıyımların eski tınısını taşıyordu."
